question.title: No appropriate method found for adding default on class org.apache.ivy.core.settings.IvySettings
question.body:
I am trying to add Ivy to an Ant project for dependency management.

I am following the quick start directions from the docs.

I appear to be finding the ivysettings.xml file because the path specified points to the correct file. Also, the error changes if I delete the file or make it empty.

Here's the appropriate contents of my build.xml file.

<project xmlns:ivy="antlib:org.apache.ivy.ant" name="My library" basedir="." default="dist">

...

    <!-- =================================
      target: resolve
     ================================= -->
    <target name="resolve" description="--> retrieve dependencies with Ivy">
        <ivy:retrieve/>   <-- line 29
    </target>

Here's the contents of ivysettings.xml

<ivy-settings>
    <settings defaultResolvers="public">
        <resolvers>
            <default name="public" description="Public Maven Repository" class="org.apache.ivy.plugins.resolver.DefaultResolver">
                <root>https://repo.maven.apache.org/maven2/</root>
                <strategy name="default" description="Default Strategy" />
            </default>
        </resolvers>
    </settings>
</ivy-settings>

My ivy.xml

<ivy-module version="2.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://antlib.oslab.org/ivy/ivy.xsd">
    <info organisation="com.xxx" module="my-common"/>
    <dependencies>
        <dependency org="org.springframework" name="spring-jdbc" rev="6.2.5"/>
        <dependency org="org.springframework" name="spring-tx" rev="6.2.5"/>
        <dependency org="org.springframework" name="spring-orm" rev="6.2.5"/>
    </dependencies>
</ivy-module>

I am doing this inside IntelliJ, but I have ant installed onto my drive and am using that ant through the settings and with ANT_HOME. I have copied my ivy jar into the $ANT_HOME/lib dir as directed.

...\IdeaProjects\...\build.xml:29: impossible to configure ivy:settings with given file: ...\IdeaProjects\...\ivysettings.xml : java.text.ParseException: failed to load settings from file:.../IdeaProjects/.../ivysettings.xml: no appropriate method found for adding default on class org.apache.ivy.core.settings.IvySettings

answers.body: Not sure what I changed, but the last change was that I deleted the ivysettings.xml file and it seems to be working correctly.
